table_description: Information about deployment descriptions, including ID, commit details, image, status, and timestamps.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the deployment.

columns.name: commit
columns.description: The commit details associated with the deployment.

columns.name: image
columns.description: The image details used in the deployment.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the deployment (e.g., pending, completed).

columns.name: trigger
columns.description: The trigger that initiated the deployment.

columns.name: finishedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the deployment finished.

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the deployment was created.

columns.name: updatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update to the deployment.
